webinar_title.description: The main title of your webinar

brief_description.description: A brief description of what the webinar covers
brief_description.default: Learn the latest strategies and best practices

key_takeaways.description: Key points to highlight (one per line)
key_takeaways.default:
Key takeaway 1
Key takeaway 2
Key takeaway 3

expected_attendees.description: Expected number of attendees for Day 10 metrics

best_practices: Start promoting 7-10 days before the webinar
Use platform-specific visuals (LinkedIn: professional, Instagram: eye-catching)
Engage with questions in real-time during the webinar
Follow up within 24 hours with replay and resources
Create a unique hashtag for easy tracking and engagement

requirements.preparation_time: 3-4 hours for customization and asset creation
requirements.during_webinar: Active social media management for live engagement
requirements.post_webinar: Follow-up content creation and resource compilation

timing_notes.event-start-time: Replace with your actual webinar start time
timing_notes.event-midpoint: Replace with approximately halfway through your webinar
timing_notes.24 hours post-event: Schedule exactly 24 hours after webinar ends

notes: This template works best for B2B educational content, thought leadership webinars, and community-building events. Customize speaker information, timing, and topic details. Consider creating speaker-specific graphics and branded slide templates for visual consistency.
